00021     public static function debug($var, $die = false) {
00022         $trace = debug_backtrace();
00023         echo '<strong>' . MOC_Misc::stripPaths($trace[0]['file']) . '</strong>';
00024         echo ' (line <strong>' . $trace[0]['line'] . '</strong>)';
00025 
00026         echo '<pre>';
00027         var_dump($var);
00028         echo '</pre>';
00029 
00030         if ($die) {
00031             die();
00032         }
00033     }

00041     public static function t3temp($path = null) {
00042         return PATH_site . 'typo3temp' . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $path;
00043     }

00051     public static function env($key) {
00052         if ($key == 'HTTPS') {
00053             if (isset($_SERVER['HTTPS'])) {
00054                 return (!empty($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && $_SERVER['HTTPS'] !== 'off');
00055             }
00056             return (strpos(MOC::env('SCRIPT_URI'), 'https://') === 0);
00057         }
00058 
00059         if ($key == 'SCRIPT_NAME') {
00060             if (MOC::env('CGI_MODE') && isset($_ENV['SCRIPT_URL'])) {
00061                 $key = 'SCRIPT_URL';
00062             }
00063         }
00064 
00065         $val = null;
00066         if (isset($_SERVER[$key])) {
00067             $val = $_SERVER[$key];
00068         } elseif (isset($_ENV[$key])) {
00069             $val = $_ENV[$key];
00070         } elseif (getMOC::env($key) !== false) {
00071             $val = getMOC::env($key);
00072         }
00073 
00074         if ($key === 'REMOTE_ADDR' && $val === MOC::env('SERVER_ADDR')) {
00075             $addr = MOC::env('HTTP_PC_REMOTE_ADDR');
00076             if ($addr !== null) {
00077                 $val = $addr;
00078             }
00079         }
00080 
00081         if ($val !== null) {
00082             return $val;
00083         }
00084 
00085         switch ($key) {
00086             case 'SCRIPT_FILENAME':
00087                 if (defined('SERVER_IIS') && SERVER_IIS === true) {
00088                     return str_replace('\\\\', '\\', MOC::env('PATH_TRANSLATED'));
00089                 }
00090                 break;
00091             case 'DOCUMENT_ROOT':
00092                 $name = MOC::env('SCRIPT_NAME');
00093                 $filename = MOC::env('SCRIPT_FILENAME');
00094                 $offset = 0;
00095                 if (!strpos($name, '.php')) {
00096                     $offset = 4;
00097                 }
00098                 return substr($filename, 0, strlen($filename) - (strlen($name) + $offset));
00099                 break;
00100             case 'PHP_SELF':
00101                 return str_replace(MOC::env('DOCUMENT_ROOT'), '', MOC::env('SCRIPT_FILENAME'));
00102                 break;
00103             case 'CGI_MODE':
00104                 return (PHP_SAPI === 'cgi');
00105                 break;
00106             case 'HTTP_BASE':
00107                 $host = MOC::env('HTTP_HOST');
00108                 if (substr_count($host, '.') !== 1) {
00109                     return preg_replace('/^([^.])*/i', null, MOC::env('HTTP_HOST'));
00110                 }
00111                 return '.' . $host;
00112                 break;
00113         }
00114         return null;
00115     }
00116 }
